QuestData.Title: The Windrunner's Fate
QuestData.Description: Finding Sylvanas is our only priority!$B$BWe will cover more ground if we split up. I will lead a team into the hills above the enemy's camp while you search the wreckage itself for any signs of the crew.$B$BOnce we've cleared the high ground, I will meet you at the far end of the beach.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the wreckage of the Windrunner and the nearby coastline for signs of Sylvanas.
